channel.title: Kubernetes on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Trip report, Tectonic 2016.
item.description: The Tectonic Summit was a conference in New York City in December 2016, hosted by CoreOS, with the theme Enterprise Kubernetes. Mohan Kartha and Edward Vielmetti went there as a guest of Packet, a bare-metal hosting provider in the city. This report details highlights of the presentations at the event as well as accounts from attendees of what they thought was missing from the presentation and discussions. Kubernetes Kubernetes is an orchestration system that runs on top of a container system like Docker.
